name: display_frame
description:
Displays an OpenCV image from a file in a window. The function waits for a keypress before closing the window.

Output: This function does not return a value.

Example: `display_frame(window_name='My Image', image_name='capture.jpg')`

window_name.description: The name for the window in which the frame will be displayed.

image_name.description: The name of the image file to open and display. Defaults to 'live.jpg' if not specified.
